alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Florence, north central Georgetown, west central Horry, central Marion and northeastern Williamsburg Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 319 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Johnsonville, or 18 miles east of Lake City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Horry, Johnsonville, Hemingway, Outland, Gresham, Pee Dee Crossroads, Poston, Brittons Neck, Kingsburg, Aynor and Stuckey. This includes SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
